text: visvasaya tæbu piriminda, visvasaya tæbu gæhænunda (taman tula) kenekuta keneku samipa sahayayan vasayen sitinnaha. ovun (keneku anit kenava) hondak karana men polambavada, papayan nokarana men valakvada, salataya nokadava itu karada, sakat gevaminda sitinnaha. allahtada, ohuge dutayatada avanata vi katayutu karannaha. mevænnanta itamat ikmanin allah dayava pahala karanneya. niyata vasayenma allah balasampannayeku ha gnanavantayekuda vasayen sitinneya
